title: Core Competency-Based Curriculum Design and Data Visualization Assessment Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic curriculum design comprehension and Excel application experience
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course for pre-service and in-service teachers, focusing on competency-based curriculum design methodologies and assessment techniques using data visualization tools.

learning_goals: Learners can visualize the mapping relationship between curriculum and 10 core competencies using radar charts
Using spreadsheet tools (Excel, etc.), learners can process curriculum evaluation data and generate visualized reports
Learners can structure presentation materials that effectively communicate competency achievement status to diverse stakeholders (teachers, learners, administrators)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
